meanings.definition: To throw or toss something upward.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys uptossing the ball during playtime.
meanings.sent2: He uptosses the frisbee to his dog at the park.
meanings.sent3: The children were uptossing colorful balloons at the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The magician uptossed the scarf into the air, making it disappear.
meanings.sent5: The chef uptossed the pancake, skillfully flipping it in the pan.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing something upward.
meanings.sent1: The uptossing of the bouquet was a highlight of the wedding.
meanings.sent2: His uptossing of the baseball was impressive to watch.
meanings.sent3: The clown's uptossing of confetti made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist's uptossing of paint created a unique splatter effect.
meanings.sent5: The child's uptossing of the toy airplane ended with a crash landing.
